name: sa
description: Swap the top element of stack A with the element below it

name: sb
description: Swap the top element of stack B with the element below it

name: ss
description: Stack A, B. Swap the position of the top element and the bottom element respectively

name: ra
description: Move the top element of stack A to the bottom of the stack

name: rb
description: Move the top element of stack B to the bottom of the stack

name: rr
description: Moves the topmost element of stacks A and B to the bottom of the stack.

name: rra
description: Moves the bottom element of stack A to the top of the stack

name: rrb
description: Move the bottom element of stack B to the top of the stack

name: rrr
description: Moves the bottommost element of stacks A and B to the top of the stack

name: pa
description: Moves the top element of stack B to the top of stack A

name: pb
description: Moves the top element of stack A to the top of stack B
